name: Loop Skate
description:
How long can you survive the Skate Loop?

Dodge rocks and build score!

Ludum Dare 47 jam entry.

Controls:

  • A or Left: move left.
  • D or Right: move right.
  • Escape: return to menu.

Options allow you to tune how quickly you speed-up, starting speed, and maximum speed. You can also turn off various visual effects.

Credits:

  • Programming - Triforcesplash
  • Programming + Pixel Art - cfdj
  • Music - Ani Hurford
  • Chrome - Vecteezy user: happymeluv
  • Halftone Italic - Iconian fonts

Tools used:
Unity
Blender
Pixel Studio
Beepbox
